title: Stream: Clock Opera – Ways To Forget
content:
One of the most highly anticipated debut albums of 2012, Clock Opera’s Ways To Forget is a sterling lesson in crafting vibrant, anthemic pop songs.

From the festival-ready opener Once And For All, through to the tinkling closer Fail Better, it’s a record that is destined to propel them to far greater heights. Ahead of the albums release next Monday (23 April), the London four piece have made Ways To Forget available to hear in it’s entirety.
